attributes.action: No confidence motion in Andy Preston
attributes.additional_details:
Middlesbrough , one of the most ethnic diverse and poverty stricken areas in the U.K. is ran by a multi millionaire, who blocks his constituents who don’t share his view, and doesn’t accept an argument that black people are more disadvantaged than white. 

Sign this petition and build momentum to get him out
attributes.background: Trigger a no confidence in the mayor and demand a better future for Middlesbrough

rejection.details:
We can't publish petitions about honours or appointments. That includes calling for elected representatives to be sacked or to resign.

If you're concerned about a particular policy or decision that's the responsibility of Government or the House of Commons, you could sign or start a petition about that.
